amendment.description: Amendment requires that OPIC publish and report to Congress any intervention by other departments or agencies of the U.S. government regarding the timing or settlement of any claim arising as a result of insurance, reinsurance, or guaranty operations. \ As amended by the Menendez amendment (A010), language was added that clarifies that the interventions requiring public disclosure are those that intend to impede or delay.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 11 printed in the Congressional Record. to require that OPIC publish and report to Congress any intervention by other departments or agencies of the United States goverment regarding the timing or settlement of any claim arising as a result of insurance, reinsurance, or guaranty operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A009) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
